root.name: God Mode
root.description: OverviewGod Mode is a third-person action game, set in the afterlife. Though it's primarily billed as a run-and-gun style shooter, there will be some form of melee combat.The game will also feature some RPG elements. Players will earn experience points and gold by dispatching enemies, which can be used to upgrade their character, unlock/upgrade abilities, and purchase/upgrade new equipment. On top of this, each character's appearance will also be fully customizable.It's not yet known how deeply these RPG mechanics will affect the core gameplay.Up to four players will be able to participate in God Mode's co-operative multiplayer mode.PC System RequirementsMinimumOS:Windows XP, Vista, Windows 7Processor:Intel Core2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2, 2GHzMemory:2 GB RAMGraphics:NVIDIA Geforce 8800 or ATI Radeon 2900 XTDirectX®:9.0cHard Drive:5 GB HD spaceSound:Any DirectX compatible cardRecommendedOS:Windows XP, Vista, Windows 7Processor:Intel Core2 Quad or AMD Phenom X4 9950, 2.6GHzMemory:3 GB RAMGraphics:NVIDIA Geforce GTX 460 or ATI Radeon 5850DirectX®:9.0cHard Drive:5 GB HD spaceSound:Any DirectX compatible cardOther Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
